query: INSERT INTO monitored_accounts (account_id, role_arn, account_name, status, auto_discovered) VALUES ('399078540411', 'arn:aws:iam::399078540411:role/CloudAuditorExecutionRole', 'DemoFMMBA', 'pending', FALSE) ON CONFLICT (account_id) DO UPDATE SET status = 'pending', account_name = 'DemoFMMBA'
